Scheme.select: select user_id,user_name,phone,remark,sex,password,small_head,big_head,(to_char(create_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')) as create_time from t_user where 1=1 [and phone='#phone#'] [and password='#password#']
update t_user set password='#password#' where 1=1 [and user_id='#user_id#']

update t_user set user_name='#user_name#' where 1=1 [and user_id='#user_id#']
update t_user set remark='#remark#' where 1=1 [and user_id='#user_id#']
